Package reservation

Class ReservationManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • reservation.ReservationManager
  • public class ReservationManager
extends java.lang.Object
    A control stereotype Represents a reservation manager in the system. A reservation manager can manage all the reservations for the restaurant

      • findAvailableTable

        public static int findAvailableTable​(int pax,
                                     java.time.LocalDateTime bookingTime,
                                     int minutesDifference)
        Check if the reservation is available & assign it the best fit Table
        Parameters:
        pax - ,number of seats in reservation bookingTime
        booking - time
        minute - difference, which is 59 in minutes
        Returns:
        bestTableID, best fit Table, if not available return 1
